name: Monstous Connections
description:
Our protagonist is a Frankenstein's monster type being; sewn together with parts. Over the course of the game you are given the option to take some of your body parts and give them to other monsters, weakening your abilities. Narratively, we used the theme to join together with other monsters to escape the town. Mechanically, we separated parts and decreased effectiveness.

Controls:

A and D are move left/right

G is grapple (grapple damages enemies it's attached to!)

Space is jump (also talk to NPCs when near)

Shift is spin attack in air.
